PARAMETERS: [DPad] or UP/DOWN Arrows - Select a scenario|[A] or ENTER - Run the query|[X] or SPACE - Send game play event|[Y] or F1 - Toggle Leaderboard type|[B] or F2 - Toggle SkipToUser(Leaderboard)|[LB][RB] or F3 - Leaderboard / Stats Query|[View] or ESC - Exit

#ITEM: # Indicator for which leaderboard query type (global or social)
